message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'cn.edu.tsinghua.tsfile.file.metadata.TimeSeriesChunkMetaData' import. Should be before 'cn.edu.tsinghua.tsfile.timeseries.read.common.SeriesChunk'.
Javadoc comment at column 0 has parse error. Details: no viable alternative at input '     *' while parsing JAVADOC_TAG
'method def modifier' has incorrect indentation level 4, expected level should be 2.
